sourcesContent:
import React, { useState, useEffect } from 'react'; import { useLocation, useNavigate } from 'react-router-dom'; import { FiDownload, FiMail, FiPhone, FiMapPin, FiClock, FiUser, FiCheck, FiArrowLeft, FiShare } from 'react-icons/fi'; const BookingConfirmation = () => { const location = useLocation(); const navigate = useNavigate(); const [bookingDetails, setBookingDetails] = useState(null); // Get query parameters const searchParams = new URLSearchParams(location.search); const bookingId = searchParams.get('bookingId'); const amount = searchParams.get('amount'); useEffect(() => { // In a real app, you would fetch booking details from the backend using the bookingId // For now, we'll use mock data if (bookingId) { // Simulate fetching booking details setBookingDetails({ id: bookingId, status: 'confirmed', bus: { id: 'BUS001', operatorName: 'RedBus Express', busType: 'AC Sleeper', busNumber: 'RJ14PA1234' }, route: { from: { city: 'Delhi', state: 'Delhi' }, to: { city: 'Jaipur', state: 'Rajasthan' }, distance: 280 }, journey: { date: '2024-01-15', departureTime: '22:00', arrivalTime: '06:00', duration: '8h 0m' }, passengers: [ { seatNumber: '5', name: 'John Doe', age: 28, gender: 'male' }, { seatNumber: '6', name: 'Jane Doe', age: 25, gender: 'female' } ], totalAmount: parseInt(amount) || 1000, paymentStatus: 'paid', bookingDate: new Date().toISOString() }); } }, [bookingId, amount]); const handleDownloadTicket = () => { // In a real app, this would generate and download a PDF ticket alert('E-ticket download feature would be implemented here'); }; const handleShareTicket = () => { if (navigator.share) { navigator.share({ title: 'Bus Ticket Confirmation', text: `Booking confirmed! PNR: ${bookingId}`, url: window.location.href }); } else { // Fallback for browsers that don't support Web Share API navigator.clipboard.writeText(window.location.href); alert('Link copied to clipboard!'); } }; if (!bookingDetails) { return (
Loading booking details...
); } return (
{/* Header */}

Booking Confirmed!

Your bus ticket has been successfully booked

{/* E-Ticket */}
{/* Ticket Header */}

E-Ticket

BusTick Confirmation

PNR
{bookingDetails.id.slice(-8)}
{/* Ticket Body */}
{/* Journey Details */}
From
{bookingDetails.route.from.city}
{bookingDetails.route.from.state}
To
{bookingDetails.route.to.city}
{bookingDetails.route.to.state}
Departure Date & Time
{bookingDetails.journey.date} at {bookingDetails.journey.departureTime}
{/* Bus Details */}
Bus Operator
{bookingDetails.bus.operatorName}
Bus Type
{bookingDetails.bus.busType}
Bus Number
{bookingDetails.bus.busNumber}
{/* Passenger Details */}

Passenger Details

{bookingDetails.passengers.map((passenger, index) => (
Seat {passenger.seatNumber} - {passenger.name}
{passenger.age}yo, {passenger.gender}
))}
{/* Journey Timeline */}

Journey Details

Departure from {bookingDetails.route.from.city}
{bookingDetails.journey.departureTime}
Arrival at {bookingDetails.route.to.city}
{bookingDetails.journey.arrivalTime}
Duration: {bookingDetails.journey.duration} Distance: {bookingDetails.route.distance} km
{/* Important Instructions */}

Important Instructions

  • Please arrive at the boarding point 15 minutes before departure
  • Carry a valid ID proof for all passengers
  • E-ticket and ID proof are mandatory for boarding
  • No refund will be provided for cancellations within 2 hours of departure
{/* Ticket Footer */}
Booked on: {new Date(bookingDetails.bookingDate).toLocaleDateString()} Payment Status: {bookingDetails.paymentStatus.toUpperCase()}
{/* Actions Sidebar */}
{/* Payment Summary */}

Payment Summary

Base Fare ({bookingDetails.passengers.length} 500) {bookingDetails.passengers.length * 500}
GST (18%) {(bookingDetails.totalAmount - bookingDetails.passengers.length * 500).toFixed(2)}
Total Paid: {bookingDetails.totalAmount}
Payment Successful
{/* Quick Actions */}

Quick Actions

{/* Contact Support */}

Need Help?

For any queries regarding your booking, contact our support team.

+91-1800-XXX-XXXX
support@bustick.com
{/* Additional Information */}

Additional Information

Cancellation Policy

  • Free cancellation up to 2 hours before departure
  • 50% refund for cancellations 2-24 hours before
  • No refund for cancellations within 2 hours

Boarding Instructions

  • Report to boarding point 15 minutes early
  • Carry original ID proof
  • Show e-ticket for boarding

During Journey

  • Follow COVID-19 safety guidelines
  • Keep your belongings safe
  • Contact driver for any assistance

Contact Information

  • Emergency: +91-1800-XXX-XXXX
  • Customer Care: Available 24/7
  • Email support within 24 hours
); }; export default BookingConfirmation;
